headline: Blackstone Finalizing A$5 Billion Loan for Australian Data Center Expansion

headline: Does Blackstone (BX) Prioritize Durable Fee Growth With Its Capital Returns And Interplex ICT Review?
summary: Blackstone Inc. recently reported full-year 2025 results showing revenue of US$14,450.27 million and net income of US$3,019.21 million, alongside declaring a quarterly dividend of US$1.49 per share and completing a US$311.77 million share repurchase program. At the same time, Blackstone is weighing a potential sale of Interplex’s information and communications technology unit, while expanding in areas like private credit and AI-related infrastructure, highlighting how actively it is...
